proposed model.from sentence: The proposed model , namely Knowledge - based Inference Model ( KIM ) , which enriches ESIM with external knowledge , obtains an accuracy of 88.6 % , the best single - model performance reported on the SNLI dataset .

statistically significant.from sentence: The difference between ESIM and KIM is statistically significant under the one - tailed paired t- test at the 99 % significance level .

76.8 % and 75.8 %.on: in - domain and cross - domain test set

baseline ESIM.from sentence:
shows the performance of models on the MultiNLI dataset .
The baseline ESIM achieves 76.8 % and 75.8 % on in - domain and cross - domain test set , respectively .

ESIM.from sentence: If we extend the ESIM with external knowledge , we achieve significant gains to 77.2 % and 76.4 % respectively .
